content.detailedDescription: I went out into my front yard, couldn't sleep, about 3:00 a.M.  looked at the crescent moon to the east.  then saw an object that looked like a moving star just below and north of the moon.  at first i thought it might be a plane.  it moved steadily in a horizontal path.  then it stopped in mid-air and hovered.  it was quite a distance up in the sky, mid-horizon.  i watched because of the hovering, this could not be a plane.  the object must have been very large, looked like a major star.  light was always white, looked like a diamond.  then the lights diminished and the object disappeared completely.  then it came back again.  it did this four times.  i became very tired and could not keep watching it.  it remained there and i went back into my house.  i believe this was a ufo.  i have never believed in ufos, but i know what i saw, i have never seen a flying object do these things before.  i knew i had seen a ufo, but didn't know what to do about it.  also, i had a sighting about seven days before this one, same type of object but in the western horizon.  will detail that in another report.
content.summary: Saw star-like object at mid horizon flying in straight horizontal path, then hovered, then disappered and came back 4 times at hovering position

content.detailedDescription: We were outside watching stars and satellites and all of a sudden i saw this large bright light come from behind the trees. i joking said look at the ufo and then we just all stood there,waiting to hear a sound of an airplane or helicopter because it was low and very large and super bright. no sound came, we heard other airplanes before and after and saw plenty of satellites and shooting stars. we were waiting to see the blinking lights but none came. we watched it move very slowly across the sky and followed it as long as we could. we do not have a very large unobstructed view of the sky. 4 adults and one child saw this. we always watch the sky at night in the summer and never saw something like this without sound or blinking lights so we were all pretty amazed. everyone just stood and watched and then when it was leaving my sight i ran around to the other side of the house to continue to see it and watched it till it went behind the trees again. i did not run to get camera because i figured it would not look like anything much on film and that it would be gone before i could get it.
content.summary: Large light moving slowly no sound very bright oval like

content.detailedDescription: We were outside watching stars and satellites and all of a sudden i saw this large bright light come from behind the trees. i joking said look at the ufo and then we just all stood there,waiting to hear a sound of an airplane or helicopter because it was low and very large and super bright. no sound came, we heard other airplanes before and after and saw plenty of satellites and shooting stars. we were waiting to see the blinking lights but none came. we watched it move very slowly across the sky and followed it as long as we could. we do not have a very large unobstructed view of the sky. 4 adults and one child saw this. we always watch the sky at night in the summer and never saw something like this without sound or blinking lights so we were all pretty amazed. everyone just stood and watched and then when it was leaving my sight i ran around to the other side of the house to continue to see it and watched it till it went behind the trees again. i did not run to get camera because i figured it would not look like anything much on film and that it would be gone before i could get it.
content.summary: Large light moving slowly no sound very bright oval like

content.detailedDescription:
I was saying farewell to two associates on a driveway off of kappler road in st helens, or when we all noticed out of the corner of our vision a strange cloud or presence to our ne.  

a translucent object, generally oval in shape, was moving down towards the earth a few miles above us and to the ne.  it was wavering like thermal waves above hot piece of asphalt in the summer. the 'ship' was transparent or translucent (could see the blue sky behind it). as we watched it halted and immediately released steam jets, or venting, at regular positions along its bottom edge.  instantly the 'steam' moved off to the north, carried by the wind.  seconds later the 'ship' completely disappeared and all was left to be seen was the steam moving far off and dissipating.  

all of this took maybe 15-20 seconds.

about 1 minute or less later 2 fighter jets flew directly over us at a very high altitude.  i could see their trails when they turned, but not when they flew straight ahead.  the jets left only slight arcs of vapor to mark their turns. several times the jets turned in a serpentine motion which was quite rare for the skies above northwest oregon.  typically they are just heading out of the area in a straight line.

we all looked at each other and my friend, said, 'that was like something out of men in black', and we all laughed and said our goodbyes.

that is all i have to report.
content.summary: Huge 'ship' that was transparent/translucent (could see the blue sky behind it) halted and released steam before completely disappearing.  then fighter jets flew over very high.

content.detailedDescription: Initially thought it was plane, as have not observed satellites so large. considered the plausibility of object being satellite sufficiently low, even though event was an hour or so after sunset, and satellites moving from sw to ne may be readily observed at that time. aircraft, blinking lights and all, were observed over city while event occurred. object did not change in appearance. object changed bearing about half way through event from ne to ene. object was huge/bright. elapsed time seemed a couple of minutes, so was likely 60-80+ seconds.
content.summary: Multiple venus size object, from sw to ene. sighted 25deg above horizon, left view over sandia mountains. flightpath altered about half way. unblinking light

content.detailedDescription: I was using dr. greers et contact tool.  i was seeing a shooting star every night within one minute of playing the crop circle recording. i did it between 2am - 3am every night for 12 days in my backyard. this was different from the shooting stars i saw every night.  it flew less than 1/2 the speed. it had no tail. it was a perfectly round ball of light. even though it was a sphere of light, it also did not have any glow to it (like a star or a comet). so, it was a very round light. it came out of a more northerly area of the northwest sky. my chimney blocked its most distant origin. so, i saw it as soon as it came past my chimnney. it flew exactly parallel to ground. it was flying in southerly direction. it seemed to be about 500 feet above all the houses it flew over. it also seemed about a 1/4 mile away. when it was directly west, it stopped and its light immediately shut off.  the exact place it stopped was the most wide open spot to observe me from. the whole thing lasted 2-3 seconds.  a normal shooting star occurred on ne side of sky about 2 minutes later. it was not very bright. it was nothing like what i am reporting.  i did not play crop circle recording again and i did not see any other shooting stars over next hour.
content.summary: Sphere of light that flew parallel to the ground, had no trail, seemed to slow down jut before it just shut off.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother had just turned off the main highway to go into the jackson-bienville game reserve about 5am. we drove about a half mile down the dirt road. all of a sudden my brother says stop the truck. he said lets get out of the truck. there's something in the sky behind us. so we got out and low and behold there was this bright white light with changing colors object in the sky. it was moving in a zig zag way. it would move up. then down. then it would stop at the original altitude when it was still. then it would zig zag to the left then to the right. it looked as if it was observing something on the ground. where it was hovering there was like a pasture and more game reserve. we watched it for about thirty mins. we had to get back into the truck and go get to our deerstand spots before sunrise. it was still there when we left. when i got to this pipeline to walk down to my spot. i had clear view of where this object might have been in the sky. as i was walking. the object was not there anymore. i could have kicked myself in the butt for not getting my cell camera out or even taking my rifle out and looking at it with my scope. we were just caught in amazement for so long.... we will never forget what we saw. one more thing. when the obect would teeter just abit while hovering. we could make out redish-orange lights that were in parallel form on each side of the craft and the lights came to a point inwhich we had come to the conclusion that this craft was of a triangular shape....I have never seen a ufo and always wanted to. that morning i did. there are beings beside us humans living amongst us!
content.summary: Going into jackson-bienville game reserver for a deer hunt. stopped and got out of truck with brother and stood there watching this object go up and down and then from side to side in movement like it was observing something on the ground.

content.detailedDescription: Single white bright light flying over the sfv (los angeles) last night around 8:30 pm.?? the object flew from west to east silently. no matter what angle it was at it always was a solid white light. a local small plane flying was actually above it,, so whatever it was, it's altitude was low.  there were no strobes or colored lights that would indicate aircraft.
content.summary: Single white bright light fly over the sfv last night around 8:30 pm.?? the object flew from west to east silently. no matter what angle it was at it always was a solid white light. a local small plane flying was actually above it,, so whatever it was, it

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures out side for a math project when i looked up and saw something strange in the sky. i took a picture of it and continued to watch it as it moved slowly in a diagonal line to the right and slightly up. the object seemed to be high up and far away. after watching it for a few seconds a tree obstructed my view of the object and i went inside to look at the picture. the object was flat and appeared to have lights on the bottom. i was surprised at what i had captured and was very curious to know what it was.
content.summary: Flatlike shape with no sounds moving slow towards southeast

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was in the susquhanna river @ the peachbottom nuculer power plant fishing in my boat with my cousin.I put the boat in @ the peachbottom mariena on the lancaster side.I
2.I always look @ the sky for light/ufos when i have a chance to be outside @ night,and it was far off and came closer.
3.Possibly a plane until it was close and i clearly seen it was not/and watched its flight pattern/movements,up down zig zaging.Also the glowing light white/blue in center and amber red around it glowing(4 red 1 white)
4.It traveled north east to south west fast at first as it got closer to the boat it slowed almost to a complete hoover.Completly silent/also descended in elevation from where i fist saw it.Watched it till it disapeard
then about 20-30 min... later a seen it higher in the sky going back the way it came but it was to high to see the amberish lights just the whiteishblue.
5.Happness excitement,watched it in awll.
the second time it gave me s sence of uneasiness, fear.It was the reason we left we both had a odd feeling to get away .
6.It flew so fast away it disappeared,thats when the fear thing hit us and we left
7.Their is some more to the story,not very good at typing fast/also have had many more experiances in my life. sighting ufos and beings. feel free to contact me if interested.I prefer the phone not email.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 lights 4 red/amber 1white/blue glowing///after it elivated could only see the white glowing light

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately ten am or somewhere around that time, sun was still low and to my right rear from the building that i just walked out from. i decided to have a cigarette,while smoking said cigarette i was looking around the work site.While doing so i also looked to the sky no particular area just around. when i looked to my left observing a large low puffy cloud at that moment an object came from its cover.Just to make note i probably would have missed  said object if it had not reflected the sun off its surface. after leaving the cloud cover. object was unobstructed from my sight sky was blue with visilable clouds in the far distance. the object was long tube like,more like a cigarette,clouds were low this day so mistaking it for a jetliner was impossible.As it moved away from me in a westerly direction i noticed it made no noise what so ever it's surface seemed opaque slightly white,as i stood there in awe watching it move over the site i did not blink for fear of losing contact with it.As it moved further away at a very high speed. it appeared to blend in with sky i hazard to say if not for it reflecting the sun it would've went unnoticed. it's speed was not that swoosh movement we all see on the big and small screen it was a steady deliberate speed. it was low enough to know it wasn't a conventional craft i've observed lots air craft around the plant and this did not fit the bill. it took all of about three seconds to leave my sight as it faded away over the the hills in the distance then the ocean beyond. i feel blessed to have seen it and hope to see more in the future.
content.summary: Object shoots out of cloud relects light from sun off it surface that really catches my eye then continues in straight path over power plant.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out of my house, looked up and saw orange ball/orb moving silently across the night sky.  at first i thought it was a plane, but the light didn't flash, and there was no noise at all.  it tracked from the northwest, then changed direction due west, appeared to speed up then dimmed out. took a few pics with my phone, but they aren't good enough to show any features. i have seen chinese lanterns in the sky, this was no chinese lantern.  i have no explanation as to what this object is.  will definitely look up more often now.
content.summary: Saw orange ball moving silently across sky, change direction then disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
I was relaxing in my backyard with my family at 6:30 pm when my wife observed a incredibly bright light to the northeast appear. i took a quick glance and wrote it off as the waning sunlight bouncing off of a civilian aircraft which i have seen many times.

within 20 seconds i knew this was not that as the light remained stationary. i told my wife to grab my binocs so i could keep the object in sight. the object was roughly above the niagara river by niagara falls but at an elevation of 10-15k ft.

when she came back i could clearly make out a greyish rectangular, sideways domino shape that had a incredibly bright white bank of light on its side. the power of these lights was nothing i have ever seen in my life. the object moved down a few hundred feet then west a few hundred feet and then shot up a few hundred feet and then just hovered for a couple minutes.

it then dipped downwards and i could see on the top was a upside down saucer shaped glowing red circle. at this point my adrenaline kicked in and i dashed into the house to try and get my 12" dobsonian dragged outside to get a closer look. 

as i swiveled the dob to the target my wife who had the binocs said its leaving. i witnessed the object turn towards the north and take off at incredible speed to infinity. within 3 seconds it was gone.

i am a seasoned amateur astronomer with 30 years of experience and i know the location of venus and am familiar with most civilian and military aircraft. this was none of those.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brighter then venus but at daytime, grabbed binocs, rectangular with super bright white lights and red glowing dome, hovering then moved at great speed to infinity

content.detailedDescription: Outside at 10:50pm looking at clear night sky towards west  when i saw a star like object with an increasing glow & increase in size lasted 2 sec stationary then moved nw for aproxx 3 sec then started exiting the atmosphere at high rate of speed the glow was fading took another 3 sec till it disappeared got smaller. 1min after that same star like object entered at a high rate of speed from south to north stops the exiting the atmospher with a bright flicker of white blue & silver colors, this  past week i seen 2 shooting stars but this one enterd directly towards earth then left at another angle, both star like objects took aproxx 5 to 6sec each observed.
content.summary: 2 star like object seen in san fernando valley ca area.

content.detailedDescription: Every morning at 4am (for years), i sit in my recliner chair, facing south, and looking west up at the stars.  i sit next to my swimming pool drinking hot tea....As i was looking up, out of no-where a bright non-flashing light appeared (a very clear night) moving very slow.  it was traveling in a south-east direction, then south (it was following the roof-line of my home that faces due-south, then it headed due-south and disappeared because of my roof line.  the total time (viewing) was about 30 seconds, traveled a an "z" configuration.................Question, i see very often, what i believe are satellites...Is there a map/grid or something that i see if i'm seeing satellites, if so please email to me.
content.summary: Appeared out of no-where,traveled in a  figure "s"

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dog at dusk, noticed in the sky directly in front of me a very bright object. the stars were not yet visible as the night sky was still dusky, not pitch black. there were no flashing lights of a plane, but there was a plane in the sky in the northern area. what alerted me was how bright the light was, it was larger than a star but not as large as the sun. it moved very fast and erratically up and down and backwards and forwards in a pattern i have never seen a plane or helicopter do. i immediately thought what is this? i grabbed my phone to video it but it dissapeared without a trace. i spoke to someone else the next day to tell them of this and they too saw this light, but in a different location perhaps more northerly. they described exactly the same manoueveres.
content.summary: Very bright light, during dusk, no stars out yet, no flashing but erratic movement

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west to a friends house in town it was clear outside and nice and cool just started becoming dusk outside. in a hurry to drop keys off that a friend needed i seen this object that looked like a mini sun at first i said to my self "wow thats a really bright star but why is it so low" as i rounded my friends street i just went about my business to get him the keys.

i sat outside for 5 or so minutes talking to him actually forgetting already on what i had seen. when i left his house i came back into the open road where once again i could see this bright sun like object. this time it had moved more to the south and it was twice as low as before. i knew right then it was no star curious i began to follow the object on a west route it was picking up speed and i found myself going way over the speed limit when all of a sudden it came to a dead stop and descended behind the tree tops to the west, i pulled my truck over and thought i would wait to see what would happen, 2 min later it popped back up and started going west and up into the sky

once again i started following it for 6 miles or so when all of a sudden it just started going so fast then in a blink it vanished right in front of my eyes. i stopped the truck once again on the side of the road in disbelief, i thought well that was crazy and turned the truck around and started heading home, when i got close to my house i made a right and was heading south when all of a sudden the object appeared over a field on bowen rd. it's at this point i noticed a transport truck and a car pulled over watching this object as well. 

once again it hovered then started moving west once again 2 min later it shot up way into the sky and was just gone. the video that was taken aug 4th on this site in the united kingdom is no doubt in my mind the same type of object as what i had seen tonight.
content.summary: Star like sun color object that grew bigger and brighter.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my adult son were walking home from neighborhood walmart. as we were heading for the crosswalk to my right a very bright,very brilliant pulsating ball? orb? it seemed solid. at first i thought it was a helicopter because it seemed about the altitude one would be if it were landing at north bay medical center which is about 2 miles ne and about 2 miles nw is travis air force base that also has a medical center from where we were standing when first spotted. i made my son stop because it was just so bright. we stood and watched it for 6-7 minutes but it did not seem to move, but i could be wrong.  
what we did notice is that it did not have any observable exterior lights. no  blinking, or flashing lights no search light. you know when you look up at one of the planets with your naked eye, how it flickers and gets bright then dim then bright? it was something like that. there was also no sound that we noticed. i was kinda getting scared that it might be an asteroid or other object burning up. but it did not seem to move. i tried to take video with my android phone device 1 block away from walmart going towards our home but it would not pick it up so i use the same device but the camera app and took about 9 stills. by the time we were half way home it was out of our line of vision.
content.summary: Walking home from walmart i noticed a very bright light low in the sky.Almost like a star pulsated from amber to deep red then back.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my computer, when out my window i notice a bright light moving across the sky, i thought it was a plane a first, then i grab my camera and tried to video on my i phone, which immediately froze and is still froze.
then i yelled for my mom to run out side to see this thing float by are house,at wich time we run out to see it pass right in front of us about 100-to 500 feet away, clear as day, it was traviling south to the north east,ifinaly got my picture to work , but it was much farther away by that time, i did manage to capture it on one picture, as it was about 10,000 feet from us.
content.summary: Bright light moving low across the sky silent very bright projecting what looked like fiber optic light from evey part of it like a bright hair spear of light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work around 9:20pm in boulder heading east.  i pulled into my driveway and looked up to see the stars.  i was about to look away when i noticed a bright star moving fast. the star-like object was coming from the west.  i thought i was seeing a falling star but realized the light seemed to be on a flight path.  the light continued to the north east. it was covered by some cloud cover towards the end of the observable flight path.  it didn't punch through the clouds it seemed to be higher than the clouds which were thunderheads.   i observed this light for about 20 minutes.   at times the object seemed to wobble as it flew away. i felt curious and a little nervous but then wondered if this was the space station or a rocket.  i was a little scared because whatever it was it seemed to be in space and probably very large.  i lost sight of the object as it disappeared into the north-east and beyond the horizon.
the object was silent. no blinking lights, no other changing lights, just a solid white star.  i had enough time to call out to my partner to come and see the light in the sky to verify what i was seeing.  she agreed it was a light in the sky and didn't see any visible signs of blinking running lights
of an airplane.
content.summary: I observed a bright star-like object travel across the sky from the west and ended going into the north-east into horizon, there was no sound no running or blinking lights.  just a bright white light.  it seemed to be in space.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to let the dog out, and noticed a technicolor orb in the sky just above the horizon. diving, swooping, all at tremendous speed. i took note as i have seen things of this sort at this part in the sky before. i went inside to see if my girlfriend would witness. side note my girlfriend is not interested at all at this point. so i show her and she starts getting uncomfortable. so she goes inside and gets my roommate to see if he can see it. he does as well. all this time this thing is diving, swooping, and changing colors. all watch it for quite awhile until we get sufficiently freaked out and go inside. we sit inside talk for a couple minutes. we wonder if the thing is still out there. go in the back and it's gone. total time about 25 minutes from first observation.
content.summary: Very distrubing lights over the horizon. called girlfriend and roommate both witness. diving, swooping. not possible manuvers seen by all.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside watching canoe journey 2013 via webstream on the internet. my 9 year old son came running into my room yelling, "mommy, mommy, there's a ufo outside! come and see!". so i jumped up as quickly as possible to se what he was so excited about. i witnessed looking north west towards the foothills of the olympic mountains, a starlike object traveling east directly above me. it was completely silent. it traveled in a straight line. it appeared to get quite a bit brighter at about 3 minutes into my observation. my husband, son, and myself all said, "wow, whoah, weird!" when the star-like object brightened. it traveled east towards edmonds and we watched it for as long as we could see it. aprox 5-6 minutes. as i watched, i thought for sure it would start to flicker or waiver, and tell me it was a chinese lantern or similar object. it did not. it was not a lantern. it was not a plane. it was not a helicopter. it was not a home-made ufo either, made from straws, garbage bags and birthday candles either. it was an unexplainable event with a ufo, plain and simple. i saw an object very similar to this one 2 blocks up the street from me a few weeks ago. i was not alone during that event either and had witnessed the same star-like object, silently moving from the north to the east. it was way below the cloud line when first observed as was this one tonight. i think i am pretty sure that what i saw was a rarity.
content.summary: Watched star-like object silently move across night sky for 5+minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I took 3 pics to the tower highest point , when the white dots appeared (ufos) flying over the hemisphere tower, you can see them in the photographs

i noticed the objects after the next day, the pics were taken at 8/1/13 11:27:50am,  us central time
content.summary: White dots, several over the hemisfere tower (americas tower)

content.detailedDescription:
Just leaving work with a friend, heading to our cars in the lot, chit chatting. i always glance at the sky because we have beautiful skies here in co and i love to look at the stars. a plane flew overhead and we both noticed the object at the same time. it was almost directly overhead, and heading north. it was extremely bright and no flashing lights. my friend said "is that a satellite??" i said maybe, but after only a second it was clear to both of us it was not a satellite. it was moving slower than an airplane, but was way too bright to be a satellite and seemed to be pulsating and zigzagging very slightly. as we watched it we both distinctly noticed it change direction from north to northeast, making a wide but very noticeable curve. it occurred to me to pull out my phone and record it. in the video you can see that it is much brighter than the stars, but that there are no flashing lights like a plane. i zoomed in on it and it is then that we saw it was a round sphere or orb that was pulsating in different metallic colors. you can here my friend faintly point out in the background that it is zigzagging, though in the video it is hard to tell the craft's movement from my own hands shaking the camera. near the end of the video i get the nearby building's roof and light, and though dimmed by the light on the building, you can see then how big and bright the object is. i didn't realize the camera stopped recording as we ran around the side of the building to continue watching it. it moved into a patch of clouds that was in the northeast sky, and was clearly above them, though i still couldn't guess the altitude. we watched it until it was too far away to see and too much clouds in that area of sky.
my friend and i are convinced we saw something really strange tonight.
content.summary: Bright large pulsating orb

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: i have been seeing all kind of ufo at my house at night. with my friend walter. my name is jose sanchez and i have been seeing the ufo for a long time now. i was not a believer at first now i am 100%.  tonight there have been like 17 ore more ufo and one came close and was very big. me my wife and kids and walter saw them. they are here and i like to know are they friendly? or why are they here for so long? etc. please believe me tonight they have been very close time active 9:10pm till 10:48pm monday aug,5 2013.  rome n.Y. 13440.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: yes whe have been seeing this for awial.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i was sitting on the porch..My cousin said "what is that light" we thought it was a plane first but didn't have the usual light it was just a ball of light we watched hover for a few seconds then it going toward the mountians and it disappeard.
content.summary: Starlike hovering then moved north east then disappeard

content.detailedDescription: Coming home around 9-10 pm, in the lockport area. tudor lane to be exact. looked at the sky and saw a bright white star like object in the night sky, moving slowly in a straight line. thought it might be a plane, but i did not witness any lights planes normally have.Stayed consistently bright white. i was very shocked and confused, not sure what it could be. i know it was no plane. at least none that i have seen looked like that. i was on foot and lost sight of the object. was hoping someone else saw it as well.
content.summary: Bright white star like object in the night sky, moving slowly in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from a basketball game we were right by my house and my dad told my friend and i to look up at the sky towards the se. we all looked up out of the car windows and saw 2 stationary red-orange spheres kind of star-like but bigger. they were just hovering there. then i go and get out of the car and so does everyone else and they were gone. we waited and looked around for about 5 minutes but they vanished. my friend took a video but then when we went back to look at it the phone said that there was no more memory.
content.summary: None moving, two parellel/perpendicular red-orange spheres hovering stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my backyard taking the trash out.

2. i heard a helicopter that sounded very loud and was traveling fast.

3. it looked like a small object speeding away from the helicopter in the same path.

4. it first appeared as the helicopter was about half way past my full line of sight. it looked like it was traveling at a steady speed for less than a second and then sped off very fast and left a trail behind it and then dissapeared.

5. i was scared because and i'm still bothered by this event because i know it couldn't have been a meteor. i really want to know what it was and want to find out if anyone else is reporting this or have seen it. i know i can't be the only person's attention that the low flying helicopter grabbed.

6. it left a trail and then dissapeared. i lost sight of the helicopter because of the tree tops about 2 seconds after the object dissapeard.
content.summary: Helicopter chasing object

content.detailedDescription: Driving on interstate, saw stationary orb red orange in color. we passed directly under orb. airplane was descending to land nearby, definitely not an airplane.  this was one light, not the multiple lights that blink like an airplane.
content.summary: Red orange orb stationary above i-89. near burlington international airport.
